website_summaries.verdict: Convenient aerosol spray, available in two sizes, effective in eliminating bed bugs, as well as fleas and brown dog ticks.
pros: A fast-acting formula that gives long-lasting control of bed bugs and their eggs
Easy and safe to use on beds, furniture, and luggage
Formula designed to kill pyrethroid-resistant bed bugs, as well as fleas and brown dog ticks
Manufacturer is a long-trusted name in insect control products
cons: Depending on extent and location of infestation, may need repeated treatments or in conjunction with another type of insecticide

customer_reviews.title: Worthy! Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: So, these guys visited me from guests that came to visit us. Of cause I shared my room. And yes these guys decided to stay behind 😥 I’ve been having sleepless nights until I came across this product 🤭 it kills them right away! I just never thought these guys would be so disrespectful to the highest level! Fun fact, they’re not under my bed or corners of mattress. They decided to hide in the head of the bed! Where I never thought of checking it out until I said, HOLD ON! I highly recommend this to everyone! Hope they’re not in between the bed😥
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 bottles of this and it definitely works. It butchered the bugs on contact. I continued to follow up on with sprays every 2 weeks for about 1.5 months and after almost a year I haven't seen any return.
customer_reviews.author: K. T.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I coupled this along with doing a steam treatment like once a week and I've been pretty clear so far of bed bugs. I had some stubborn ones so it definitely took some time. This isn't an overnight fix. You have to stick with it. But overall I've been using it for a few weeks now. Basically hitting cracks and corners of my big storage bed frame and along the corners of my room. I haven't seen any so I would like to think its working pretty damn well.
customer_reviews.author: N-I-C-K

customer_reviews.title: Using this, in combination with furniture cups and diatomaceous ...
customer_reviews.text: Using this, in combination with furniture cups and diatomaceous earth dust, I have been bed bug free for almost a year now.
customer_reviews.author: Sunjeet Baadkar

customer_reviews.title: Makes the bugs come out and Die
customer_reviews.text: My family and I went on vacation a few days later noticed odd bites all over us that wouldn't go away... Sprayed this on the couch where we saw zero bugs but knew they had to be in there! About 4 days later We saw them on pillows and cushions! This helped them come out!!!!!! I think because we sprayed this it definitely killed some but caused others to come out and scatter.. I sprayed this on the ones I saw and they died in a second! Unfortunately we threw out our entire couch because it was infested! But thanks to this spray it helped us figure out exactly where they were coming from
customer_reviews.author: KPEP10

customer_reviews.title: Best thing I ever got
customer_reviews.text: Best thing I ever got. A neighbor in my building brought bed bugs in and I didn't I would be affected. I was wrong. This has helped me to get rid of them after much cleaning and clearing of the area. They do nest in places you can't see such as the undersides and backs of clothing drawers and under rugs. For me they came in through the walls of our building where the radiator wall heat pipes come through.. my spraying through those holes helped out greatly. Can't suggest this enough for anyone affected. Don't leave any area unturned. Many other suggestions of reapplying every 2 weeks doesn't hurt at all..
customer_reviews.author: VerveMan

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: Saw one bed bug but had no bites so I bought this and sprayed everything. Nothing happened for two weeks so I resprayed anyway and woke up with bites in the morning for the first time. Called exterminator and they said the stuff just repels them for a short time it doesnt kill them unless its directly sprayed on them.
customer_reviews.author: Darian Kaminsky

customer_reviews.title: Great Stuff
customer_reviews.text: Extremely effective. After using several different highly rated dproducts, two cans of this spray did the trick. I did not havea heavy infestation, but they just kept coming. I'm keeping another can on hand, but so far, problem solved!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This Product Works!!
customer_reviews.text: I caught a specimen [BedBug] and placed it in a ZipLock. I zapped it with several other 'natural' bedbug killing solutions and those DID NOT WORK - the specimen was still alive after 2 weeks! This Ortho product killed it on contact! I used it on a new specimen which told me that I still had these bedbugs going unhindered! If you get a chance to get a specimen, try your product and see if it works; I waited a few hours after the first zap seemed to kill it and yes, it's still dead! Ortho got it right!
customer_reviews.author: MRA Brooklyn

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended to all
customer_reviews.text: First spray that we found that really kills the bugs. Highly recommended to all!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Order 2 bottles just to be safe....
customer_reviews.text: Used in combo with 2 other products, seemed to have worked. Will be checking again this weekend just to be sure. But i did catch the issue early on. But if your a heavy sprayer such as myself lol the bottle doesnt last long.
customer_reviews.author: KPS2014

customer_reviews.title: This product has the worst instructions of any product purchased.
customer_reviews.text: Instructions are so bad that I limited the use because there are no drying instructions and I have no way of knowing how long it takes or the danger level to humans and pets after it. dries. Also no telephone number to call for support. Lastly thee very small print should not be legal on a potentially dangerous product.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Girman

customer_reviews.title: Did it work?
customer_reviews.text: I can't really tell you if this stuff works. I can only tell you I am bed bug free for three months now. I'm a foster parent and some kids brought me their bug gifts in 2017 and I've been battling them since. I've used everything you can imagine; but, I can say that this is the last product I tried after finding the final infestation in the wall. I haven't seen evidence of bed bugs for the past three months.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged.
customer_reviews.text: I can't say whether this works or not as I used it prophylactically. My daughter was in Italy and rented an apartment that was infested with bedbugs. She moved out and treated her clothing and bags before she came home but I wanted to make sure she didn't bring any into our house. I used this to spray her suitcase and other items. I didn't see any bugs but wanted to make absolutely certain that none came in our home so I can't say if the spray works or not as we used other treatments as well (placing her items in black, contractor bags and leaving them in a hot vehicle, washing all clothing in 60 degree celsius water, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Sewcrafty

customer_reviews.title: No Smell/No Discoloration/Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to spray on some black dining room chairs I found out a yard sale. A friend of me warned of the possibility of unknowingly bringing bed bugs into my home. So, I cleaned up the chairs and sprayed this on all of the seemed areas where bed bugs generally go. It goes on as a foam and then dissipates into the fabric. No discoloration at all. No obnoxious smell. Once it dries you have no idea that anything was used on the fabric. Also, you don't need to worry about ventilation issues b/c the spray is pretty direct. So, you can spray your furniture, suitcases, etc without needing to have them brought outside of your home.
customer_reviews.author: Bria Dear

customer_reviews.title: Try this before tossing your bedding .
customer_reviews.text: Had a houseguest that unknowingly brought along these annoying vermin. My bedding cost over 1200.00 , so I searched for options. My first thought was going with a professional service . They pick up your mattress and box spring and in essence bake them. Unfortunately Covid-19 happened so that option wasn't available. I purchased two cans of Ortho and along with two other items I'm pleased with Ortho . If you know or suspect you have bedbugs I recommend this item .
customer_reviews.author: csmith8354

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Got the nasty vermin bedbugs?! Kill them dead. All of them. This stuff takes only a few applications per the instructions, and you're literally home 'free.' Don't bother buying anything else. This, my fellow buyers is the solution. Been there. Done THAT.
customer_reviews.author: Mellanee Hawk

customer_reviews.title: It really works.
customer_reviews.text: We live in Colorado. One of the worst states for bed bugs. We got a small infestation a few months ago. We have dealt with them before. But after fighting them back for 2 months. I finally said enough. I never like using insecticides because I have two children. After one application of this product, which was easy to use. We haven't had a single issue, it really works. Oh and wear a mask, gloves and change your clothes when your done. I stand by this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Trigg

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My son lives in an apartment and unfortunately was totally infested before they realized they had a bedbug problem. They ended up bringing those nasty little critters into my home as well. Tried many different things but decided to give this a try based on other user reviews. Totally worth the investment. Rid myself of the nasty little buggers in less than a month so ordered some more for my son. They have almost totally eliminated a heavily infested living space. They saw a couple in the living area a month after using this stuff and quickly sprayed the heck out of the area. So far, so good. Can't say enough good things about this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: this is food for bedbugs, they love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: this might kill OTHER things. it does NOT kill or even bother bedbugs, in fact it seems they enjoy eating it. i caught a bedbug and put it in a jar, then sprayed it with the bedbug food called Ortho Home Defense Dual-Action Bed Bug Killer Aerosol Spray. other than making the bug stronger and healthier nothing happened.
customer_reviews.author: zangetsu

customer_reviews.title: I found that roach spray works much better to kill bed bugs
customer_reviews.text: this bed bug killer does not kill bed bugs. I sprayed the bed bugs with this product and they stay alive. I found that roach spray works much better to kill bed bugs.
customer_reviews.author: patrick

customer_reviews.title: Dust mites, Bed Bugs
customer_reviews.text: My job that I work at has dust mites and bed bugs; ridiculous I know but that’s the life of Las Vegas call centers. Three days in a row it was literally a mess. I sprayed some all around my desk and even though the smell is strong, I find that it has worked. I’m so greatful to have found this product
customer_reviews.author: OrdinaryRi

customer_reviews.title: Best $10 ever spent
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use one my bed. I did and it worked, but then I sprayed the carpet cracks near my bed and what do I see in there when I checked later that night? Dead bed bugs! This stuff works wonders and how many bites did I get last night after spraying? 0! This stuff is a godsend! It was heftier than I originally thought, too. An amazing value indeed!
customer_reviews.author: HauntedDreamz1

customer_reviews.title: Odorless!
customer_reviews.text: I can't comment on whether this kills bed bugs because I thought I had bed bugs then found out I didn't. What I am commenting on is the smell - it's odorless. I also spray my suitcases before traveling and haven't brought home a bed bug since (knock on wood).
customer_reviews.author: Prancing unicorn 8

customer_reviews.title: Work with another spray
customer_reviews.text: This spray along with harris bed bug spray work great for me. I use it on my bed and on the carpet also since it work on the eggs also. I was getting temporary result with just bed bug spray and then I noticed that once the temperature started getting warmer, here come the bugs, I started reading reviews from other people and that's when I noticed that harris spray did nothing for the eggs. But using this product along with harris spray, I believe that I have founded my solution. Living in an apartment complex, I still spray, at least, once every two weeks
customer_reviews.author: Patricia B.

customer_reviews.title: These are non returnable/ non refundable. Don't buy unless you are certain you need it.
customer_reviews.text: I am giving a 1 star because I wanted to return unused, unopened product & was denied a refund. I saw nothing in original purchase saying it was non refundable & I bought 3. What a waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: temecumommy

customer_reviews.title: One of the best for bedbugs I have used
customer_reviews.text: One of the best for bedbugs I have used. Have purchased over 10 cans (I work with a owner of an apartment building and we give these to the tenants if they have seen any bedbugs)
customer_reviews.author: Pyro

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I had a bedbug problem and I used this a few times and let's just say it got rid of my problem. I did it about every 2 weeks just to make sure they where gone. Management didn't even know.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Not worth purchasing
customer_reviews.text: I'm not going to recommend this product. What ticks me off about this product is that you shake the can and feel product inside, yet it comes out in a weak stream or not at all! This causes a waste of money because you can't use the majority of the spray! Money is important and I can't be spend money on products that only allow you to use part of their product. It works okay, but I've had to move on to another more effective product.
customer_reviews.author: shirley bunkley

customer_reviews.title: It really works !!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a used bed frame and it looked clean, but after a week I noticed red bumps on my arms. It turns out I had bedbugs. I tried different things from amazon and only this did the trick. I literally covered the frame with poison and sprayed around the floor and wall areas near the bed. I haven't seen any bugs in two weeks. I'll reorder another spray just to repeat the process a few more times.
customer_reviews.author: Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Didn't do anything at all, and my flea infestation worsened
customer_reviews.text: I sprayed this all over my apartment to kill fleas. Not only did it not kill them, but when I returned, the infestation had gotten worse. I ended up paying for a professional exterminator to come and handle the problem - it was well worth it. This product? Not so much.
customer_reviews.author: Kayley

customer_reviews.title: Only a First Step in Eliminating Bed Bugs
customer_reviews.text: As someone who has just had his life turned upside down by those little critters from the firey pits of Hades known as bed bugs, I can tell you that no one product in a can, no matter the quality, is going to rid you of the blasted things. This spray does indeed kill the ones you can spray directly, but know for everyone you see, there's a dozen more that you can't. And each one of them are busy multiplying as quickly as they can. Face the music, folks, without professional extermination you're fighting a losing battle. Good luck. ( you'll need it )
customer_reviews.author: Michael Dion

customer_reviews.title: Very Effective! Best Contact Spray!
customer_reviews.text: When I discovered I had bed bugs I thought I would lose my mind. I calmed myself did my research and discovered this product from Ortho. It is truly the best at ridding yourself of those awful critters. But, it must be used in conjunction with other methods of eradicating yourself of bed bugs! Make this part of your attack plan, you won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Oh boy! they do work well.
customer_reviews.text: We started to notice baby bed bugs in one of our bed rooms. It was not very much infested but it's the starting stage which could've put us in sleepless nights if we didn't use this product. Pros: Starts to show results in hours to days, Works on carpet, corners and crevices, Kills the whole bed bug family :D Cons: Strong smell. You wouldn't wanna be in the room for few hours after spraying this. Nozzle spray is too strong to keep pressing for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Sameer

customer_reviews.title: no bad Oder
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised how fast it work on the bugs we had around our house and there was no bad Oder like other bug sprays.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia & Julie

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Saturated my one-bedroom apartment carpet in this, let it sit for two hours, vacuumed. Did that two days in a row and there was a dramatic difference in the flea problem in my house. I pray I never get fleas again but if I do I would definitely use the spray to help elliminate them in the carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Paez

customer_reviews.title: bed bug free :)
customer_reviews.text: I'd have to say this stuff worked. Sprayed bed waited a bit did it again, then put bed bug cover on. Havent had issues since :)
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: I think it works great
customer_reviews.text: im not too sure. I was getting bites at night so I got this as precautionary application around my bed. I thought I was having bed bug bites but they were mosquitos. so anyway it didn't hurt to use this stuff anyway after the fact. doesnt smell doesnt leave any kind of residue. I like it. no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: mikesoops

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BELIEVE THE DESCRIPTION! DOES NOT KILL FLEAS!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use as a flea spray. The description clearly states that it kills fleas. However, when the can arrived, it does NOT mention fleas, only bedbugs. I do not have bedbugs, but I do have summer flea problems due to my outside/inside pets. Then . . . I find it CANNOT BE RETURNED! VERY UNHAPPY.
customer_reviews.author: PW

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome product. I've brought this product numerous of times
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome product. I've brought this product numerous of times. When sprayed, it melts the bed bugs instantly. Definitely recommend if you have bed bug problem.
customer_reviews.author: Mz_Luckycharm

customer_reviews.title: its dangerous to my animals
customer_reviews.text: the magnitude of danger in this product.if this is too dangerous why sell it?it states on the can to after use to wash your clothes..what?additionally its impossible to get ahold of ortho to talk to them about how to dispose of this can because I cannot use it.
customer_reviews.author: Honey's World

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I use this spray quite frequently for my bedbugs. It works for about a week, then the pesky little critters are back. I dont understand why bedbugs are around in the first place. What good are bedbugs? These little critters just irritate me so badly!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Eeekkk no more bugs please.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because my wonderful neighbors brought them with them when they moved into their apartment. I have always trusted the Ortho name I have layered it on my box springs and mattress. I spray it down about every three to five days, by doing this I am hoping to disrupt the hatching and killing to where it is under control.
customer_reviews.author: Izzy Litwiler

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work for dust mites
customer_reviews.text: I bought it because I have a terrible dust mite allergy, and the reviews said it kills them too. I don't know whether it kills dust mites, but it is of no help to my allergy, and as I had difficulty sleeping before, I still have it now, although I used the spray regularly on my pillow and mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: Did not work at all. Watched one crawl on past
customer_reviews.author: Stephy

customer_reviews.title: Dont use this
customer_reviews.text: Products like this send the bugs into your walls. A few days to a week later they come right back
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: The fumes are not bad, gets job done, I haven't seen those horrible little blood suckers!
customer_reviews.author: CINQUE

customer_reviews.title: It works great
customer_reviews.text: It works good for spot treatments but u need powder and actual spray for house. It is very easy to use an no bad smell like others. it works so much better than hot shot or what ever its called.
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work well for a couple of days. Doesn't kill all of them, I put it around the sides of my bed to keep the bedbugs from bothering me at night. Still trying to figure out how to get rid of all of them permantly.
customer_reviews.author: C McC - Tennessee

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: Bugs are actually worse after using. Tried it twice in combination with the Ortho Home Defense Spray. No help at all. Waste of time and money. I want my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Bunty

customer_reviews.title: the wand fails twicee now
customer_reviews.text: it is the same problem, twice now , it works a couple of times then after half the container is gone it jams up in the wand clogs , batteries are fine but the product doesnt come out, it is the second time i piurchased this 0.5 container and the same results wind up discarding it and no matter what setting it is on it fails BIG .TIME
customer_reviews.author: Pat C>

customer_reviews.title: Go by advice of pple u know personally
customer_reviews.text: I spent more than i usualy do. The cap is annoying. The chief complaint is that it doesn't work as well as the cheApo products i've been using. Thought i take a chance & see how much better a well known name brand would preform. Sorry i did, still have some left. So not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Allison m.

customer_reviews.title: This product will solve your bed bug problem. The ...
customer_reviews.text: This product will solve your bed bug problem. The key is to spray this in the cracks and crevasses on your bed frame that's where they hide and breed. This products kills them and the eggs. I was free from BB within 2 weeks. HAVE BED BUGS???? BUY THIS!!
customer_reviews.author: TELEK PETERSEN

customer_reviews.title: Bed bugs suck
customer_reviews.text: Best product for bed bugs. I have never had a problem like this and I tryed 3 products before this. It was GREAT. Not much Oder and after 3 weeks no more bed bugs. A lot of work involved with vacuum and washing but this product most definitely killed them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Junky

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: We got this after an incident of a family member sleeping in our bed while babysitting our kids and having bed bugs after a few uses kills the bed bugs and does away with them haven't seen them since we've used this in our room. Which was the only spot we had them in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Kills 'em
customer_reviews.text: I don't know where they came from, but a few bugs showed up on our couch. I used this spray, and I nipped them in the bud. I'll be spraying once a week to make sure no other beasties pop up, but I'm happy with how quickly, and efficiently they were killed off.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Johnson

customer_reviews.title: May not work well for major use
customer_reviews.text: We sprayed it in an apartment Living Room for bedbugs and it took care of the problem before they spread to other areas ,may not work well for major use. Could be effective for treating a minor issue that is confined
customer_reviews.author: Tomi-Ray

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I used all of it!!! killed what bugs were left. have not seen any since!!
customer_reviews.author: scs

customer_reviews.title: Good preventative measure.
customer_reviews.text: If you have an actual bed bug problem I don’t think this will eliminate it. But I like to use it as a preventative measure when I change the bed linens weekly. It does have a strong smell so after you spray the mattress you may want to make sure animals and children don’t stick around.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree Hartz

customer_reviews.title: helpful
customer_reviews.text: Killing bedbugs is a slow process but I think it certainly helped. Secret is to discover their nesting area and then really I think about anything will kill them. Downside for me was I think I didn't really need this strong of a pesticide.
customer_reviews.author: JkHay

customer_reviews.title: Good product to
customer_reviews.text: This product killed beg bugs immediate and keeping killing week after week
customer_reviews.author: miguel

customer_reviews.title: Spray can doesn't work well.
customer_reviews.text: The product is okay but the spray nozzle on the container doesn't work most of the time. I ended up only being able to use the product twice disappointing to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: beverly j braxton

customer_reviews.title: Kills them dead
customer_reviews.text: Completely wiped out the bed bugs. Have not seen even a dead one for a month. I have been looking.
customer_reviews.author: jerry moulton

customer_reviews.title: Works great as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Add another success story here to helping getting rid of those little pesky things. But as others have said you'll need to keep applying it every once in a while. I ordered more than 1 to make sure. Smell is nearly non existent and drys up quite quick too. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: George B

customer_reviews.title: Big bomb
customer_reviews.text: This is a bug bomb! I didn't realize that when I bought it, and that was an unwelcome discovery. Can't be used around pets, which doesn't work for me bc I have nowhere to place my cat. Great product, I would imagine, if this is what you need!
customer_reviews.author: Miriam

customer_reviews.title: Great at inhibiting, not ceasing completely.
customer_reviews.text: Seem to have worked as far as keeping them at bay, but didn’t rid of them.
customer_reviews.author: Raven Rose

customer_reviews.title: Product could be improved.
customer_reviews.text: Problems with pressing the spray-button. Fingers not strong enough to hold can firmly and press button at same time. Have recently found other spray-products with better system.
customer_reviews.author: Marty Martin

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I compared the ingredients against what the professional's use and found it very similar. This stuff works.
customer_reviews.author: SueeyP

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Got this because there were wood mites by the bird cage and the fast thing I can get ahold of. Did the job but delivery guy didn’t follow direction and left my package on the porch while I was out of town
customer_reviews.author: FONZ

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy.
customer_reviews.text: I like it was easy to use. I dislike the top was broke when I received it and it didn't kill the bugs.
customer_reviews.author: LaRaven

customer_reviews.title: sprays all over your hand
customer_reviews.text: the can is easy to spray, but inconsistent output. then it starts to like foam up and drip all over your hand instead of where you want to spray it. doesn't seem to be working either. best to call an exterminator
customer_reviews.author: TAMI MARTIN

customer_reviews.title: Buy This!!!
customer_reviews.text: This Works... So work every Penny. I have a queen size mattress and sprayed both bottom and top mattress with half the bottle, worked as soon as I sprayed the mattress. Killed on contact.
customer_reviews.author: BRENDA

customer_reviews.title: Good series
customer_reviews.text: Story is good. Author writes the series of books to stand alone so lots of repetition and i found myself skipping pages as descriptions were just endless. Otherwise a fun read.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.text: Effective against bedbugs. Those little guys have developed a resistance to many other bedbug sprays that rely on permethrin alone. So far, this formula has proven to be effective.
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: No top or sprayer on 1 can. Was not in the box.
customer_reviews.text: Received product & one can had no top or sprayer, can interchange tops just wanted customer service to know. My friends & I shop consignment & use as a precaution.
customer_reviews.author: linda g

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked well but difficult to use since it won't spray upsidedown.
customer_reviews.author: Azure

customer_reviews.title: Great Bed Bug Defense
customer_reviews.text: Great product, killed bugs on sight after spraying. Also a great preventarive if you have neighbors who have bed bugs, and are worried about potentially having these pests. I sprayed in doorways and cracks they could crawl in through. I would also spray on bedding after waking up and making bed for the day just in case. The problem went away in less than a week!
customer_reviews.author: Seb26860

customer_reviews.title: It is absolutely odor-free which made me feel much more comfortable sleeping in the room after using it
customer_reviews.text: This seemed to do the trick with nasty bed bugs. It is absolutely odor-free which made me feel much more comfortable sleeping in the room after using it. Seems very effective but with bed bugs you need to be diligent and use it even if you're not finding them.
customer_reviews.author: ShellyM

customer_reviews.title: You won’t me mad you bought it!
customer_reviews.text: This thing really works. What it does is it paralysis them where they can’t move and they die on the spot. Their paralyzed in a matter of seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Stovall

customer_reviews.title: didn't work. No soomer did I finish spraying, ...
customer_reviews.text: didn't work. No soomer did I finish spraying, more bedbugs came out.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: A second foaming product that KILLS BEDBUGS! So much ...
customer_reviews.text: A second foaming product that KILLS BEDBUGS! So much more effective than the Eco-friendly stuff. Try this product, anything that is effective against bedbugs is a serious product. Thanks Ortho, GJV.
customer_reviews.author: GJV

customer_reviews.title: highly recommend to purchase this product and I would to again
customer_reviews.text: very effective and it works well. highly recommend to purchase this product and I would to again.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Nicky

customer_reviews.title: Works !
customer_reviews.text: Sprayed this on the bed frame and the bottom of my bed and no more spiders and or other little bugs they stay away
customer_reviews.author: R34

customer_reviews.title: You Still have to find alternative.... ...
customer_reviews.text: You Still have to find alternative.... This one alone won't help... Just temporary affect and we still see bugs in minutes
customer_reviews.author: Revanth R

customer_reviews.title: Scent too strong
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if it works but the scent is super strong and chemical smelling not a fan of it.
customer_reviews.author: ShanShan

customer_reviews.title: Maybe mites
customer_reviews.text: Not so good... I think the problem might be mites though because they’re invisible to the eye. Nonetheless this stuff didn’t work for it.
customer_reviews.author: Shanice

customer_reviews.title: VERY GOOD SPRAY
customer_reviews.text: KILLS ON CONTACT OR SPRAY ALONG THE BASEBOARDS WHERE BEDBUGS LIKE TO HIDE. ANYWHERE THESE BOOGERS ARE SPRAY AND THEY'RE DEAD.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks like only works on contact
customer_reviews.text: It did startle the bed bugs in the bottom of my bed frame and mattress but I doubt that it killed any of them until I used on contact.
customer_reviews.author: Sushant

customer_reviews.title: Not pet friendly but
customer_reviews.text: I kept the cats out of the room until the spray dried then had the best nights sleep in days. Re-apply after two days.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Worked for Me Very Well!
customer_reviews.text: Got to my bug problem early and this spray nailed it! Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: PatKat9000

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: We had fleas. Sprayed this one time and the fleas were gone. Sprayed again in two weeks just to make sure. This spray was a life saver!
customer_reviews.author: T Butler

customer_reviews.title: Find out where you bed bugs come from.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good product. Easy to use and very efficient. I have never had bed bugs before but I think they came in on some bathroom tissue from China. So far this is working really well.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Got this for stink bugs.We get them horribly in the summer time.Kills on contact and keeps killing for a couple weeks.Also worked on dust mites i the attic window
customer_reviews.author: Piggiepugsmom

customer_reviews.title: Not really what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Does not really work at all unless sprayed directly diatomaceous earth seems better and has no harmful chemical in it
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solution to any bed bug, fleas, etc..
customer_reviews.text: This spray works perfect to eliminate any pesky pest problems. Works immediately and haven’t had any issues with any pests anymore after just one use. Definitely recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: K Boo

customer_reviews.title: Nothing works better than this
customer_reviews.text: This is the best product I have purchased to do the job. Nothing else had worked but this did it. It went fro infestatation 100% to contained 99%. Must buy
customer_reviews.author: PatrishaVenegas

customer_reviews.title: only used half of it
customer_reviews.text: the sprayer stopped working unfortunately seemed to work for @ week or so to keep bugs away
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Lang

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy
customer_reviews.text: Seems to kill bed bugs on contact, just remember to spray, clean wait several days and do it all agsin
customer_reviews.author: Ellery Crossman

customer_reviews.title: Very effective!
customer_reviews.text: When combined with DE, haven’t seen any bed bugs in months. Thanks Ortho
customer_reviews.author: Captain

customer_reviews.title: I believe this stuff works!
customer_reviews.text: I pretty much soaked the mattress where they were found...probably at least a month ago...and haven't seen a bug since.
customer_reviews.author: hisworkmanship

product_meta.title: Ortho Home Defense Dual-Action Bed Bug Killer Aerosol, 18 oz.
product_meta.description: Use Ortho Home Defense Dual-Action Bed Bug Killer for long lasting bed bug control. Available in two sizes, the convenient aerosol is fast acting and kills Resistant Bed Bugs and their eggs. In addition to Bed Bugs, use Ortho Home Defense Dual-Action Bed Bug Killer to kill fleas and brown dog ticks.
feature_bullets: Use on beds, furniture and luggage
Kills bed bugs, fleas and brown dog ticks

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping. Learn More
